Smart Timer: An electric toothbrush with a smart timer that tracks the user's brushing time and alerts them when they have been brushing for the recommended two minutes. The toothbrush could also provide personalized brushing recommendations based on the user's individual oral health needs.

Toothbrush with-Nature Brushing Mode: An electric toothbrush with a mode that simulates brushing with natural materials like bamboo or charcoal. This mode would be ideal for users who prefer a more natural approach to oral care.

Toothbrush with UV Light: An electric toothbrush with a built-in UV light that can help to detect and remove bacteria from the teeth and gums. This would be a great feature for users who are concerned about oral hygiene and want to take extra precautions.

Toothbrush with App Integration: An electric toothbrush that can be connected to a smartphone app. The app would allow users to track their brushing habits, set goals, and receive personalized feedback on their oral health.

Toothbrush with Interchangeable Brush Heads: An electric toothbrush with interchangeable brush heads that can be customized to meet the individual needs of different users. For example, one head could be designed for sensitive teeth, while another could be designed for deep cleaning.
